attributes.action: Protect areas of our land and oceans from exploitation.
attributes.additional_details:
Over 50% of the world's species are estimated to be at risk of extinction, each year the earth loses 18.7 million acres of forests and an estimated 14 billion pounds of trash is dumped in our oceans.

We need to make a change, protect our land and oceans and preserve them instead of destroying them. 

The future of humanity, our planet and all life on earth now depends on us to make a change.
attributes.background: Protect areas of land and oceans from exploitation by individual nation states or corporations in hopes to decrease the effects of climate change. We need to dedicate a big percentage of land and oceans for wildlife and their habitats where no human can interfere.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
